## Collections.Utils.KeyValueValidators.validateKey() method

Validates a supplied unknown as a valid key value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
validateKey(key: unknown): DetailedResult<TK, ResultMapResultDetail>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

The unknown to be validated.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[DetailedResult](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;TK, [ResultMapResultDetail](./ts-utils.collections.resultmapresultdetail.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the validated key value and 'success' detail if the key is valid, or `Failure` with an error message and 'invalid-key' detail if the key is invalid.
